post:
Dear friends,

I have some spare space on our Sweden shared hosting server, which was newly-setup, so here is an offer. :P

<pre>
Disk Space: 1 GB
Bandwidth: 250 GB
Addon&Parked Domains: Unlimited
Email Accounts: Unlimited
FTP Accounts: Unlimited
Databases: Unlimited
Location: Sweden
Control Panel: VestaCP
Price: 4.00 EUR/yearly ~= $4.35/yearly
But, I don't like to dig out cents in shops, so I will not do this to you.
Use: BEGONE35CENTS to bring the price to 3.68 EUR, which today in accordance with exchange rate brings the plan to $4.00/year.
Link: https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=116
</pre>

And one more plan, for people who need some more rooms in their website's flat. :p
<pre>
Disk Space: 30 GB
Bandwidth: 1 TB
Addon&Parked Domains: Unlimited
Email Accounts: Unlimited
FTP Accounts: Unlimited
Databases: Unlimited
Location: Sweden
Control Panel: VestaCP
Price: 3.00 EUR/monthly ~= $3.26/monthly
Again, use: BEGONE26CENTS to bring it down to $3.00/month
Link: https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=122
</pre>

**Useful Info:**
<pre>
USD pricing is posted based on the today's exchange rate. 
1 EUR=1.08760 USD.
</pre>

**About us:**
<pre>
drServer started offering service around November of 2013, so we're 3 years old.
</pre>

**Useful Links Section:**
<pre>
Terms of Service: https://vikinglayer.com/tos.php
AUP: https://vikinglayer.com/aup.php
Ticket us: https://vikinglayer.com/clients/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1
Forum: https://forum.drserver.net
</pre>

**Network Info:**
<pre>
Sweden Location
LG: http://lg.as42708.net/
Choose router: cr1.sto1.se
</pre>

**Get Social:**
<pre>
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VikingLayer/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/VikingLayer

We will sometimes post special deals there (including up to 90% off) so stay tuned. :)
</pre>

Thank you for reading. Have a nice day. :)
